user_query: I'm organizing a team-building event for my company and I want to incorporate some humor into the activities. Can you provide me with a list of joke categories to choose from? Additionally, generate a random programming meme to share with the team and lighten the mood. Finally, use the 'praise' API to create a motivational message for each team member.

TaskList.description: Get a list of joke categories to choose from for the team-building event.
Generate a random programming meme to share with the team.
Create a motivational message for each team member using the 'praise' API.
